feed.title: Planka Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.24.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Ability to provide extra env variables in Helm (#961)
  • fix: Update Russian translation (#958)
  • fix: Quote variables to prevent word splitting (#962)
  • fix: Downgrade i18next to fix language change issue

New Contributors

  • @florczakraf made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/962

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.24.2...v1.24.3

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.20
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.24.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add button to delete all pending notifications (#993)
  • fix: Update Polish translation (#990)
  • fix: Exclude Greek characters from font
  • build: Ensure npm version compatibility, fix casing warnings (#975)

New Contributors

  • @lukas346 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/990

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.24.3...v1.24.4

entry.title: New release for Planka: planka-0.2.21
entry.content: A Helm chart to deploy Planka and it's dependencies.

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.25.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Ability to set list color indicator (#1033)
  • fix: Update French translation (#1030)
  • fix: Configurable database schema name (#1046)

New Contributors

  • @Marc-Andrieu made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1030
  • @lukascorona made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1033
  • @its-nikhil made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/1046

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.24.4...v1.25.0
